sdmtools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

set levels

Source: R/set_levels.R
set_levels.Rd

Convenience function for setting SpatRaster levels names to enable setting in piped workflows.

Usage

set_levels(x, levs)

Arguments

x

SpatRaster

levs

data.frame

Value

SpatRaster

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
categorical_raster |>
 set_levels(
  levs = tribble(
    ~value, ~category,
    30, "URBAN CENTRE",
    23, "DENSE URBAN CLUSTER",
    22, "SEMI-DENSE URBAN CLUSTER",
    21, "SUBURBAN OR PERI-URBAN",
    13, "RURAL CLUSTER",
    12, "LOW DENSITY RURAL",
    11, "VERY LOW DENSITY RURAL",
    10, "WATER"
   )
  ) %>%
    as.data.frame()
} # }
